texts.en:
Philomina and Comfort make up this group. They sells cloth and underwear. This has been their work for the past two years.

Philomina, the leader, is 26 years old and married to Jame, who is a driver and is also 28 years old. They are blessed with two children. Through her hard work and faithfulness, she has been able to expand her work and is doing very good. The two partners need an amount of 1,800 GHS (Ghana cedis) to buy more goods to sell to their respective customers.

loans.use: To buy more goods to sell.

loans.name: Catheline

texts.en: Catheline is 33 years old. She is married with six children. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans and sweet potatoes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more sweet potatoes and beans for sale.

loans.name: Rosa Candida

texts.es:
Rosa de 52 años de edad, no tiene un nivel académico,es casada, su esposo trabaja como jornalero y vende y compra ganado,tiene dos hijas el cual le ayudan a su negocio.


 Ella desempeña varias labores como la  de pupusas, torttilleria y tienda de productos de primera necesidad y la compra y venta de ganado. Antes se dedicaba a la sastrería, pero decidió poner los otros negocios el cual le generan mas ganancias, el horario es de ocho hasta siete de la noche.

 
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar fertilizantes, abono y una parte para los otros negocios que tiene y la necesidad queda cubierta porque se beneficiaran ella y su familia.

Ella  manifiesta que desea que sus negocios  prosperen y  que generen mas ingresos y espera que para el futuro su familia tengan todo lo necesario, las ganancias las utilizaran para pagar las cuotas y lograr todo lo que se propone con la ayuda de Dios y credicampo.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 52, doesn’t have a formal education.  She is married; her husband works as a day laborer, and also buys and sells cattle.  She has two children who help her with her business.

Rosa carries out various jobs such as selling pupusas, making tortillas, running a convenience store, and buying and selling cattle.  Previously, she had worked as a seamstress, but she decided to begin these other businesses, which generate more earnings.  Her schedule is from eight until seven at night.

She will use the loan to buy fertilizers and soil amendments.  Part of it is for the other businesses she has.  This will cover her needs and benefit her and her family.

She says that she wants her businesses to prosper and generate greater earnings.  She hopes that her family will have everything they need in the future.  They will use the earnings to make the loan payments and achieve everything that they set out to do, with the help of God and Credicampo.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and soil amendments, and to use the rest of the loan for other businesses that she has.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase base dresses for designing and sale, and to invest in client recruitment.

loans.name: Zohra

texts.en:
Zohra is married, and she lives with her husband, sons, and a daughter-in-law. The family lives at Bala Bahmanli village, in Fuzuli region. They are IDPs (internally displaced persons), originally from Fuzuli City. Zohra’s son is married, and he is a taxi driver. Zohra has poultry: hens, roosters, and chicks. She earns money by selling eggs, and selling chickens to regular customers and neighbors.

Today, her number of poultry is getting to be a lot. She applied to Komak for a loan, in the amount of 1800 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan, she will build a hen-coop, buy some more poultry birds, and increase her business. After this increase, the number of her customers will be more and her monthly income will be better. She is thankful to Kiva organization for their help.

loans.use: to build a hen-coop and buy some more poultry birds.

loans.name: Bernadette

texts.en: Bernadette is 53 years old. She is married and has nine children, aged between 13 and 33 years. She has been selling fruits and vegetables for the past ten years. With this loan, she would like to buy more pineapples and vegetables for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more pineapples and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Milka

texts.en: Milka is a 26-year-old married woman.  She has 1 child.  She operates a retail business where she sells bread, milk, drinks, cakes, salt, biscuits and other items. Her business is located in an urban area. She will use the loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to add to her stock of bread, drinks, milk, sugar, soap and other items. Her business goal is to have a wholesale store within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: add to her stock of bread, drinks, milk, sugar, soap and other items.

loans.name: Maria Bernarda

texts.es: María de 56 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo desde hace mucho tiempo. María se dedica a la comercialización de verduras y frutas en el mercado central de su localidad. de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea reparar el techo de su humilde vivienda y construir una pared, por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra lámina galvanizada y polines. Espera poder tener acceso a este financiamiento y así proceder lo antes posible a la realización de las mejoras de su vivienda.
texts.en:
María is 56 years old and has been living with her husband in their own home for a long time. María sells fruits and vegetables in the central market of her town. This is how she earns her living and supports her household.

She wishes to repair the roof of her modest home and build a wall, so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to buy galvanized sheet metal roofing and lumber. She hopes to be able to access this loan and proceed as soon as possible with the improvements to her home.

loans.use: To buy galvanized sheet metal roofing and lumber for repairing the roof of her home and building a wall.

loans.name: Felicita Maria

texts.es:
La señora Felicita de 39  años de edad, es madre soltera,  tiene dos  hijos  que dependen de ella, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras.
Doña Felicita no tiene casa propia y vive en casa de una hermana y se dedica desde hace 03 años  a la venta de ropa y detergentes de forma ambulante,  sus clientes le prefieren por su buen trato y sus precios sus muy buenos.
Doña Felicita es una mujer que lucha día con día para sacar adelante a sus dos hijos que tiene en la escuela y colegio, es un buen ejemplo de lucha para la demás personas.
Doña Felicita está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de blúmeres, brazieres, blusas, camisas, faldas, pantalones, etc. ya que tiene varios pedidos de ropa nueva para esta época de navidad, con el apoyo del préstamo ella suplirá la necesidad de financiamiento, es su segundo préstamo que solicita.
Doña Felicita su sueño es mejorar su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Diciembre del 2013
texts.en:
Felicita, 39, is a single mother with two children who depend on her.  She lives in a community in San Lorenzo, a valley in southern Honduras.  Felicita doesn't have her own house and lives in her sister's house and for 3 years has sold clothing and detergent as a street vendor.  Her clients prefer her because she treats them well and her prices are very good.  Felicita is a woman who fights daily to support her children in grade school and high school.  She is a good example of fighting for other people.

Felicita is requesting this loan to buy pajamas, bras, blouses, shirts, skirts, pants, etc since she has several requests for new clothing for this Christmas season.  With support from the loan she will fill her financial needs; it is her second loan she's requested.  Felicita's dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - December 2013

loans.use: to buy pajamas, bras, blouses, shirts, skirts, pants, etc for her business

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence is married with five children. She sells various items in her boutique. With the loan, she wants to buy more juice, cooking oil and biscuits for resale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business. She was happy with the previous loan, which helped in upgrading her business.

loans.use: to buy more juice, cooking oil and biscuits for resale.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Ismael es un cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia:

Ismael tiene 43 años, es casado desde hace 8 años y tiene 2 hijos; de 7 y 5 años.  Su esposa se llama Miriam y ella se dedica al hogar, aunque también le ayuda con las ventas de calzado. Vive en  una casa rentada desde hace 2 años y comparte los gastos de la misma con sus hermanos.

Él tiene un taxi, el cual opera 6 días de la semana; para tener un día de descanso. Aparte de operar su taxi, Ismael junto con su esposa vende zapatos por catálogo; de esta manera tiene una fuente de ingreso adicional. Pide este préstamo para hacer arreglos necesarios con respecto a su taxi: tramitar su seguro, su tarjetón y reparar algunas partes como la  licuadora, los amortiguadores y el disco de frenos.

Gracias a su trabajo Ismael ha logrado tener su taxi propio y sacar adelante a su familia con una buena calidad de vida. Su principal reto es tener su casa o departamento propio.
texts.en:
Ismael is a client of Kubo Financiero, and this is his story:

Ismael is 43 years old.  He has been married for eight years and has two children, ages 5 and 7.  His wife is named Miriam; she works in the home, although she also helps him with his shoe sales.  He has lived in a rental house for two years, and he shares the expenses of the home with his siblings.

Ismael has a taxi, which he drives six days a week in order to have one day off.  Besides running his taxi, Ismael sells shoes from a catalog, along with his wife.  In this way he has an additional source of income.  He is asking for this loan to make necessary arrangements for his taxi: to insure it, to register it, and to fix some parts such as the power steering, the shock absorbers, and the brake discs.

Thanks to his job, Ismael has managed to get his own taxi and get his family ahead, with a good quality of life.  His main goal is to own his own house or condo.

loans.use: to make needed repairs on his taxi and to process some paperwork for the taxi.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline is a 43-year-old married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself as a person with potential. She operates a farm where she keeps dairy cows, poultry and also grows tea. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in a fertile place and her primary customers are large scale. She describes her biggest business challenge to be labour. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, seeds, and other items. Her business goal is to do large scale tea farming within 5 years. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, seeds, and other items.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 46-year-old, married man. He has two children, aged 15 and 20 years. He describes himself as honest. He operates a retail shop, where he sells maize flour, soap, cooking fat, and other items. He also keeps dairy cows, which produce milk for him to sell.

He has been involved in the retail shop for 10 years. His business is located in a productive area, and his primary customers are local residents. He says his biggest business challenge is the lack of enough funds to buy more stock.

He will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy a stock of maize flour, soap, cooking fat, sugar and other items. He hopes that in the future, he will have a wholesale store.

loans.use: to buy stock for his shop, including maize flour, soap, and cooking fat

loans.name: Gezim

texts.en:
Gezim, who has been a long time client of VFA, is requesting a loan to pay for his two sons' university tuition fees and he will very much appreciate the financial help from lenders. He is in his early fifties, married, and living in southern Albania where he practices agriculture/livestock.  Here is what he said:
“I have been doing the same thing all these past 24 years and will continue in the same vein. I don’t know anything better. I sell the fresh produce to the farmers' market of our nearby city and that is our only source of income. Of course, the more we work in agriculture does not mean that we make more because it depends on various factors such as the weather condition, the selling market, the government involvement, the type of produce and the demand for it and so on.

loans.use: to pay for his sons' university tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase dried fish for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar generator for his home

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
This is Fatuma. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to purchase food ingredients, for her food-preparing business.

Now, she would like to apply for a loan of KES 30,000. She will use it to buy more stock of food ingredients for her business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to meet her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to buy more stock of food ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, bitter ball, rice, vita, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Leoncie

texts.en: Leoncie is 47 years old. She is married and has five children, four of whom go to school. She sells various items in her stall. With this loan, she wants to buy more sorghum and beer to sell. She plans to use the profits for reinvesting in the same business.

loans.use: To buy  more foodstuffs to sell, such as sorghum and beer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Phoebe

texts.en:
Phoebe is a 32-year-old, married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as innovative. She operates a farm where she keeps poultry, and dairy cows that produce milk for her to sell. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her primary customers are local residents. She says her biggest business challenge is lack of market.

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more dairy cows. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will become a successful entrepreneur. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more dairy cows

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is a 41-year-old married man from Rafah city. He is a father for seven kids: five sons and two daughters. Adnan works as an employee in the public sector with a very low income. This income is barely enough to cover all the family's needs. Adnan decided to buy a small rickshaw and transfer goods for the local traders. It helps the family with part of the their expenses.
 
Adnan took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new rickshaw to transfer goods for the local traders. By taking this loan, Adnan will be able to improve his business and also his income. 

Adnan appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw to transfer goods for the local traders

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials to build a perimeter fence

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia de 29 años de edad habita en  condiciones muy humildes junto a su grupo familiar. Ella se dedica a la venta de perfumes, cremas y cosméticos desde hace mucho tiempo. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ventanas para la vivienda y para la compra de láminas galvanizada para reparar el techo de la misma.
texts.en:
Antonia, 29, lives in modest circumstances with her family.  She has made a living for a long time selling perfume, creams, and cosmetics.  She makes her sales on foot in the main areas of her town.

Antonia wants to improve her living conditions, so she's asking FUSAI for this loan to buy windows for her house and galvanized metal to repair the roof.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal to repair her roof

loans.name: Jose Nelson

texts.es: José de 29 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos de 4 años y 10 años de edad.  José se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, emprendedor y sobre todo responsable. ÉL trabaja como albañil y además junto a con su compañera de vida mantienen una venta de verduras como: tomates, güisquiles, cebollas, chiles, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto Y para repellar las paredes de su vivienda. Con el crédito  comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo y grava, etc.
texts.en:
José, 29, lives in his own house with his companion and his children, ages 4 and 10.  José's known as a hardworking, enterprising, and responsible man.

He works in construction and also sells vegetables with his companion: tomatoes, chayote, onions, chili peppers, etc.  He earns a living and supports his household this way.

José wants to improve his living conditions, so he's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in building a room and plastering the walls of his house.  With the loan he'll buy cement, sand, bricks, gravel, etc.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, and gravel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medical drugs and expand his traditional medicine business

loans.name: Qimmat

texts.ru:
Эту милую женщину зовут Киммат. Ей 52 года. Киммат замужем, в браке у нее шестеро детей. Все члены ее семьи живут в городке Турсунзаде Республики Таджикистана.
   Киммат занимается выращиванием скотов. Ей усердно помогает ее дети. Киммат хочет расширить свой бизнес путем расширения количество скотов. Сумма кредита является не большой, потому что она решила не рисковать и продвигать бизнес осторожно и продуманно. Киммат верит, что ей помогут сделать первый шаг по расширению ее деятельности.
texts.en:
This pretty woman is named Qimmat.  She is 52 years old.  Qimmat is married and has six children.  All her family members live in the city of Tursun-zoda in Tajikistan.

Qimmat raises livestock.  Her children diligently help her.  Qimmat would like to expand her business by increasing her livestock count.  The loan amount is not large because she decided not to take a risk and to grow the business carefully and thoughtfully.  Qimmat believes that she will get help to take the first step to increase her business.

loans.use: to increase her livestock count

loans.name: Fausto

texts.es: Fausto de 68 años  de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y un nieto.  Fausto trabaja como fontanero desde hace mucho tiempo y además con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer una pequeña  papelería en la cual vende variedad de productos escolares. Desea mejor las condiciones de su vivienda ya que la madera del techo se encuentra deteriorada y desea hacer el cambio por material más resistente. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de polines para hacer el cambio de la madera en mal estado del techo.
texts.en:
Fausto is 68 years old, and lives in his own house along with his wife and a grandson.  Fausto has worked as a plumber for a long time and with much effort he has managed to establish a small stationery shop in which he sells a variety of school products.  

He wishes to improve his living conditions because the wood in his roof is damaged and he wants to switch it out for stronger material.  For this reason he asks for a loan from FUSAI to buy roofing supports in order to change out the wood that is in poor condition in his roof.

loans.use: to buy roofing supports in order to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more local food stuffs like gari, palm oil, beans and pepper for resale.

loans.name: Bohye Group

texts.en:
This group is made up of three persons with two working in retail. They sell cloth (lace), bags, and are united by good social relationships. This is their seventh loan.

Gertrude is the group's representative. She is 56 years old and married. 

She would need this loan to buy fabric, cloth and "kente" to sew and sell to her customers. Her business is doing very well because the location where she sells her products is a very busy one.

With her seventh loan, she plans to spend GHS 2,000 to buy fabric. With the profits, she supports their building project and covers the household expenses, and saves some money with ID-Ghana.

They need a total amount of GHS 3,200 to meet their customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy more goods and sell to customers.

loans.name: Maria Estefana

texts.es: María Estefana es originaria del área de San Martin Jilotepeque, tiene 42 años y desde hace más de 5 años se ha dedicado a la compra y venta de gallinas. Su puesto lo tiene en el mercado, esta agradecida primeramente con Dios y con Kiva por el apoyo que le han brindado para salir adelante,  gracias a ese apoyo está cumpliendo su sueño que es ayudar a sus padres y a su sobrinitos. Solicita el crédito para tener una inversión más grande ya que el capital que tiene no le alcanza para comprar más gallinas ya que tiene buena demanda. Sus pagos los ha realizado puntualmente, es responsable con sus pagos ha trabajado tres creditos y no callo en mora.
texts.en:
María Estefana is from the area of San Martin Jilotepeque. She is 42 years old, and for 5 years she has been in the business of purchasing and selling chickens. She has a stall in the market and is grateful to God and to Kiva for the support they have given her to get ahead. Thanks to this support she is fulfilling her dream of helping her parents and her nephews. 
She requests this loan to make a larger investment since she does not have enough capital to purchase more chickens, for which there is high demand. She has had 3 loans before and always made her payments on time and been responsible, never falling behind.

loans.use: to purchase animals for sale.

loans.name: Paata

texts.en:
Paata is a very hardworking and responsible person. He is 31 years old and lives in village Gavazi, Kvareli region. His family consists of his mother, wife, and 2 children. 

Sadly, for lack of economic resources and because he had to start working at a very young age, Paata was unable to study a professional career. He works hard on family-owned agricultural land, growing maize, strawberries, and nut trees. He always has high quality products which are sold to local retailers for a good price, but the income from this activity isn't enough to meet the basic needs of his family. 

To continue running his agribusiness in a sustainable way, Paata needs 1,000 GEL to start trading with citrus, purchasing it and then continuing seasonally with other products. He received the credit in the framework of the joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, a so-called Startup Program that gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. Paata also has a truck and nowadays serves local people. After starting citrus trading he will move the products with his car and sell them to the local market. 

Paata and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will be thankful to them for their support in collecting the needed loan to sustain his agribusiness.

loans.use: To start a trading business with citrus and other seasonal products

loans.name: Akwe Group

texts.en:
The Akwe Group is composed of three persons, who are friends living in the same community. This is the seventh time this group has requested financial aid from ID-Ghana to boost their businesses. Gifty is 44 years old. She is married to Alex, a 46-year-old water distributor. They have four children. 

Gifty has been educated to the secondary school level and is the leader of the Akwe Group. She is alone in ensuring that the household expenses are covered. To meet the needs of her family, she has been selling plastic products and cooking utensils for about ten years in front of her house.  

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her income, Gifty, together with the other members of the group, is requesting a seventh loan. The previous loans were indeed repaid without any default. The entire group needs GHS 3,900 to buy more goods to satisfy their respective customers.

loans.use: To buy more products to sell to customers

loans.name: Sai Baba Group

texts.en:
Nayana, age about 32 years old, is the group leader of a four-member group from JKPur Town situated in Rayagada District of Odisha State in India. Her family consists of five members: her husband and three daughters, ages about 13, 10 and 8. The member standing at the extreme right is Nayana.

Nayana is a very active lady who wants some extra income from her own efforts. She has been running a tailoring shop with the support of her husband for the last five years.

Nayana along with three other members of her village formed a group, and this is the first time they will take out a loan from Mahashakti Foundation for the development of their existing businesses. At present, Nayana's family income is 5,000 Indian rupees (INR) per month, which is not sufficient to maintain her family. To improve her living conditions and to earn some extra income, she wants to avail a loan. From the loan she will purchase a Pico machine. She has a dream of opening a training institute for tailoring in her locality.

Regarding the other three members of the group, two members, Rajeswari and Sarojini, want a loan for leaf plate making and selling and the third member, Rajeswari, wants a loan for a salon.

loans.use: to purchase a Pico sewing machine

loans.name: Sandra Guadalupe

texts.es: Sandra de 24 años edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos desde hace tres años.  Tiene experiencia en su negocio y muchas personas la prefieren ya que siempre ofrece precios accesibles.  Desea reparar la galera donde mantiene a sus pollos de tal forma que puedan estar en un lugar más cómodo  y pueda tener más espacio. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito  a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, polines, cemento, arena y grava, maya ciclón, etc. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Sandra is 24 years old, lives in her own house along with her husband, and has made a living raising and selling chickens for three years.  She has experience in her business and many people prefer her because she always offers affordable prices.  

She wishes to repair the shed where she keeps her chickens so that they can be in a more comfortable place that has more space.  Therefore, she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to buy sheet metal, roofing supports, cement, sand, gravel, chicken wire, etc.  She says she has the ability to make the payments for the loan.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, roofing supports, cement, sand, gravel, and chicken wire to build a shed for the chickens.

loans.name: Leidy Ximena

texts.es:
Ella quiere estudiar auxiliar de enfermería, porque siempre desde pequeña le ha gustado ayudar a las personas que se han encontrado enfermas.
Ella al tomar este curso de auxiliar de enfermería es una ventaja para seguir estudiando y completar el proyecto de vida.
Ella con este convenio de kiva, quiere ayudarle a los papas, porque depende económicamente de los padres, ya que el es el que trabaja y responde económicamente por todo, a si que ella podría aprovechar la oportunidad de este convenio y de la mejora económica que tendría en la familia y en la casa.
texts.en: She wants to study to be a nursing assistant, because ever since she was little she has liked to help people when they are sick. After taking the nursing assistant course she will have an be at an advantage to continue studying and complete her life's project. With this agreement from Kiva, she wants to help her parents because she is financially dependent on them. They work and are financially responsible for everything, so she would like to take advantage of this opportunity to improve her family's economic situation.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soft drinks, pure water, butter, soap, and cigarettes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar generator

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan de 21 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. Juan es un joven muy emprendedor y responsable quien se gana la vida mediante la venta de jugos y agua de forma ambulante en diferentes comunidades de su localidad. Juan desea construir un cerco perimetral en  su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tela metálica, ladrillo, hierro, cemento y pagar mano de obra para la construcción del mismo.
texts.en:
Juan is 21 years old, and has lived in his own house along with his family for a long time.  Juan is a very enterprising and responsible young man who makes a living by selling juices and water as a street vendor in different communities in town.  

Juan wants to build a perimeter fence for his house. For this, he has asked FUSAI for a loan to buy wire netting, brick, iron, and cement, and to pay for the labor to build it.

loans.use: to buy wire netting, brick, iron, and cement, and to pay for the labor to build a perimeter fence for his house.

loans.name: Angie Lizeth

texts.es:
Es Angie Lizeth, estudiante de Arte Gráfico y Publicitario entra a estudiar quinto semestre, es una joven de 19 años, de Bogotá, que le encanta el dibujo, escuchar música, leer e informarse, le fascina jugar fútbol, y le llama mucho la atención todo el área del mercadeo y la publicidad.
Ella se encuentra trabajando en la noche, en el cargo de impulsadora y promotora de ventas, ella estudia en las mañanas Diseño Gráfico, Angie se encontraba estudiando en las noches Diseño Industrial en una Universidad, incluso entraba a cursar el tercer semestre en Diseño Industrial pero por cuestiones económicas tuvo que aplazar esta carrera, motivo por el cual decidió conseguir un trabajo y poder ahorrar para retomar los estudios de la noche y poder colaborar a los padres con el pago en el estudio en arte gráfico, angie quiere terminar las dos carreras y lograr lo que se ha propuesto, pero con el trabajo apenas puede colaborar a los padres económicamente y costear los estudios.
Ella de verdad necesita nuevamente la ayuda de KIVA ya que siempre es un ahorro en la casa y un ahorro para ella misma, porque los padres eran los que le pagaban los estudios, pero ahora ellos no pueden, por eso ella consiguió un trabajo para ayudarles y para poder ella cubrir los gastos del estudio de arte gráfico, ustedes ya conocen la historia, los logros , las metas, lo que ella ha hecho, de todas formas con problemas y obstáculos Angie anhela verse como profesional en 4 años en amabas carreras, pero ahora por cuestiones económicas se le está corriendo el tiempo y no quiere perder, ella desea retomar la carrera en Diseño Industrial y graduarse este año con el título de Técnico Profesional en Arte Gráfico y Publicitario para poder terminar la carrera Profesional como Diseñadora Gráfica.
texts.en:
Angie Lizeth, 19, is a Graphic and Commercial Art student in Bogotá entering her fifth semester. She loves to draw, listen to music, read and educate herself. She also likes to play soccer and is very interested in the area of merchandising and publicity.

She works at night as a booster and sales promotor. She studies graphic design during the day. She was studying Industrial Design at the university, and had started her third semester, but due to finances she had to defer this career. Because of that, she decided to get a job so that she could save money to return to her studies at night and help her parents with the costs of her schooling in graphic design. Angie wants to finish both programs and achieve what she has set out to do, but her job barely allows her to help out her parents and pay for school.

She really needs the help of Kiva because money is always scarce in her parents home and for her, and although her parents used to pay for school they can no longer do so. That's why she got the job - you already know about the history and her goals, what she has done and achieved. Despite the problems and obstacles, Angle dreams of seeing herself become a professional in both careers within 4 years, but right now she is running out of time and doesn't want to lose her dream. She wants to return to the Industrial Design program and graduate this year with the title of Professional in Graphic and Commercial Art.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Olger

texts.es: Olger, tiene la edad de 32 años, está casado, vive con su esposa la cual es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de herramientas y equipo de construcción de buena calidad y que satisfaga la necesidad, las cuales le facilitará la elaboración de los trabajos y así poder mejorar la calidad de los mismos y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido en capacitaciones y poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de herramientas y otros equipos, y también lograr un mejor acabado a los trabajos, además de aumentar la oferta en trabajos y calidad. Con esta compra pretende hacer más contrucciones y con diseños más variados y así cumplir con los pedidos a corto plazo. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja
texts.en:
Olger, 32, is married and lives with his wife who is his top priority. With this loan he plans to buy tools and good quality construction equipment to meet his needs, which will help with his jobs and improve their quality. He will take advantage of the knowledge he has gained in trainings and will be able to make more money to continue investing in other tools and equipment and better accomplish his work. He will be able to improve the price and quality of his work.

With this purchase he plans to be able to do more construction with more varied designs and thus meet his short-term orders. This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had loans from other institutions, but FUDECOSUR has given him a loan more easily and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 21 years old single young man from Jenin City. He lives with his family in a small simple house. Mohammad's father works as a taxi driver, which is the only source of income for the family. Mohammad is a student in his last year at a local university where he studies accounting. He would like to complete his studies and find a job. 
Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay for the university tuition for this semester. By taking this loan Mohammad will be able to complete his studies and receive a BA degree. 
Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the university tuition for this semester.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.en: Shoira is a young and purposeful woman. She is not married and lives with her parents. She is going to organize a new business. She studied at the course "To Get Ahead" of a women's organization and got a certificate. She is going to organize a business with sewing and selling. She will sew national mattresses, spreads and toys. She will sell her products in a local market. Shoira is asking for a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy fabrics to organize her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy fabrics to organize a new business.

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
El comité San Miguel se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Están pasando al 5to ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres. Es un grupo de mujeres muy unidas y se ayudan mutuamente. Todas las Sras. Se dedican a la agricultura, específicamente en el cultivo de piña y banana. Son mujeres de zonas rurales, sumamente alejadas de las zonas céntricas que aún están en crecimiento.
Sandra solicita de este crédito para invertir en la cosecha de piñas y bananas y luego encajonar para la venta. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y por sobre todo emprendedora.
texts.en:
San Miguel Communal Bank was formed by several neighbors from the city of Santaní.  They're in the fifth loan cycle of the women's committee program.  It's a group of women who are very close and help each other.  All the women earn a living in agriculture, specifically growing pineapple and bananas.  They're women from rural areas that are extremely isolated from central areas that are still growing.

Sandra's requesting this loan to invest in harvesting pineapples and bananas, then packaging them for sale.  She's a very hardworking and enterprising woman.

loans.use: to harvest pineapples and bananas and package them for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Sokneng's Group

texts.en:
Sokneng is a resident of Dambae district in Kompong Cham province. She is a young mother and is blessed with two dependent sons. To deal with her daily cost of living she relies on a single business, cassava farming, which she has been involved with for several years. The business generates about 41,000 KHR per day for her. 

This is not the first loan for Sokneng with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She repaid her previous loan, which had enabled her to relieve her burden as a result of her improved livelihood. For this loan cycle, Sokneng teams up with another person to get a new loan. As the leader she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing fees, labor costs and to buy fertilizer. She hopes to increase her income from her crop so that she can improve the condition of her house.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide to improve her cassava business

loans.name: Raul

texts.en:
Raul is a Peruvian artisan who specializes in hand-woven tapestries. He would like to invest in the purchase of alpaca and sheep wool, his principal materials for production.

Raul has been selling through NOVICA since 2000. This is his story:

"After secondary school, I dedicated my energy to painting, finally cultivating the latent talent and skills of a self-taught artist. My father taught me to weave in the San Pedro de las Cajas style. I love to paint, and I love to weave. They are both forms of expression, and often after I explore a theme in my weavings, I will repeat them on the canvas. I sign my pieces after my second name, Angel."

"Thank you all so much for this microcredit - it's a great incentive for us artisans to keep developing our craft."

Use the link below to view Raul's hand-woven tapestries on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/735

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of alpaca and sheep wool, his principal materials for production.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.en:
Guatemalan artisan Pedro specializes in handcrafted jewelry. He would like to invest in the purchase of fine silver and jade for production.

Pedro has been selling through NOVICA since 2011. This is his story:

"When I was 20, I began working in a silver workshop and my passion for making handcrafted jewelry was born. I specialized in engraving silver and have had my own workshop since 1980; it's a simple place, but I have all the tools and space I need to work. I am very grateful for this wonderful opportunity you are giving me and my artisan community in Guatemala."

"I am grateful for this microcredit because it enables me to continue working at my craft. Your support through this microcredit has been very useful, and I would like to thank you on behalf of all Guatemalan artisans. Having access to a microcredit is a wonderful opportunity for us, and I also hope you like the products we craft thanks to this. Please receive my most heartfelt thanks."

Use the link below to view Pedro's silver and gemstone jewelry on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/8193

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of fine silver and jade for production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, pepper, okra, rice, fish, meat, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Fredy Alexander

texts.es:
Fredy es un joven de 21 años de edad, es soltero, aún no cuenta con la responsabilidad de hijos o esposa por lo que se puede decir que nadie depende de él; vive junto a su madre y hermanos, por causas económicas no pudo estudiar más que el sexto grado de educación básica, posteriormente existió la necesidad  que buscase una fuente de ingresos para cubrir los gastos de la familia. 

Actualmente, trabaja como ayudante en un pequeña ferretería, dicha ferretería está ubicada a 1.5 kilómetros de donde vive. Tiene ya más de dos años de ser ayudante en dicho establecimiento y es el encargado de la elaboración de tejas, bloques, etc. También es el responsable de trasladar los productos que se venden a las residencias de los clientes. Es su primer empleo y pues está muy agradecido con el voto de confianza que se la ha dado para salir adelante.  

El destino que se le dará al crédito, es para la compra de una motocicleta, él ha visto la necesidad de tener un medio de transporte en primer lugar para poder trasladarse de su casa de habitación a su lugar de trabajo y viceversa debido a que en ocasiones sale muy tarde de trabajar y no logra tomar el autobús. También comenta que se le hace importante contar con un medio de transporte, para realizar cualquier tipo de diligencia relacionado a su familia y se le hace más fácil viajar en motocicleta que hacerlo en autobús por ser más segura la primera opción.

Los sueños o planes del cliente a futuro son formar un hogar, tener hijos y contar con un trabajo que le permita poder cubrir todas la necesidades y obligaciones que esto representa, también aspira a poder construir junto a la casa donde vive con su madre, su propia casa y poder independizarse. El cliente es consciente de la importancia y el apoyo que brinda Credicampo con los créditos y hará el máximo esfuerzo por pagar siempre puntual sus cuotas, para con ello garantizar que se puedan lograr los sueños a los que este aspira. El préstamo será de una gran ayuda, para poder movilizarse sin ningún tipo de inconveniente y poder rendir más en su trabajo al poder llegar más temprano para el cumplimiento de sus obligaciones laborales.
texts.en:
Fredy is a young man, age 21. He is single and does not yet have the responsibility of children and a wife, so it could be said that nobody depends on him; he lives with his mother and siblings. For financial reasons he could not go to school past the sixth grade, after which time there came the need to look for a source of income to cover the family expenses. 
 

Currently Fredy works as an assistant in a small hardware store, which is located 1.5 kilometers from where he lives. He already has more than two years of experience being an employee of this establishment, and he is in charge of making tiles, blocks, etc. He is also responsible for transporting the products they sell to the homes of their customers. It is his first job and he is very appreciative of the vote of confidence that he has been given to advance. 


The purpose of this loan is to buy a motorcycle. Fredy has seen the need for having a mode of transportation, in the first place for being able to transport himself from home to his place of work and vice versa, since occasionally he leaves very late from work and doesn't manage to catch the bus. He also says that it is important for him to have a mode of transportation in order to run any kind of errand for his family, and it would be easier to travel by motorcycle than bus because the first option is safer. 



The dreams and plans of this client for the future are to make a home, have children, and have a job that allows him to cover all the necessities and obligations that this requires. He also aspires to be able to build his own house onto the house where his mother lives, in order to be more independent. This client is very aware of the importance and support that Credicampo offers with their loans, and he will make his best effort to always pay his fees on time. This way he can achieve the dreams to which he aspires. The loan will be a great help, to be mobile without any kind of inconvenience and to be able to get more done at his job from arriving earlier to complete his work obligations.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy es casada y tiene 2 hijos ambos estudiantes universitarios, los cuales con mucho sacrificio pudo criar y brindarles todo lo que necesitan para ser alguien en la vida.
Ella se dedica al negocio de venta de joyas de plata  en su mayoría y en una pequeña cantidad de oro, gran parte al contado y una pequeña parte a crédito.
Ella compra las joyas de la ciudad de Luque y las vende por la zona de Ciudad de Este. Comenta que por las noches está montando un pequeño negocio nocturno de comidas rápidas y venta de bebidas en su domicilio.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas varias para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo y luchando por mejorar.
texts.en:
Nancy is married with two children, both of whom are university students. She sacrificed a lot to raise them and to provide them with everything they need to become someone in life.

She has a business selling jewelry, mostly silver jewelry as well as a small quantity of gold. She sells mostly in cash and occasionally by credit. 

She buys her jewelry in the city of Luque and sells it in the area of Ciudad de Este. She says that she is setting up a small night business selling fast food and drinks from her home.

She has applied for this loan to invest in the purchase of assorted drinks which she will sell. She will then be able to continue with her work and fight to improve.

loans.use: to buy assorted drinks for sale.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita de 49 años de edad es madre soltera y se dedica a la compra y venta de productos lácteos. Margarita ha visto la oportunidad para aumentar sus ingresos por lo que ha solicitado un préstamo a FUSAI y con el dinero desea comprar una hielera más grande y mandar a construir un carretón para vender además de los lácteos, refrescos de distintos sabores. Ella está muy entusiasmada con poder conseguir su objetivo.
texts.en:
Margarita, 49, is a single mother.  She makes a living buying and selling dairy products.

Margarita has the opportunity to increase her income, so she has asked FUSAI for a loan.  With the money she wants to buy a larger cooler as well as have a cart built for selling the dairy products and beverages of different flavors.

She's very excited about being able to achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy a cooler and to build a food cart

loans.name: Eliu De Jesus

texts.es: Don Eliu de Jesús es originario de la ciudad de León. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comida rápida. Se siente agradecido con KIVA y MiCrédito ya que ha logrado establecer su propio negocio el cual le ha ayudado a obtener mejores ingresos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Pan, Lechuga, Carne, Tomate, Salsa de tomate entre otros productos para la elaboración de las Hamburguesas. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá ampliar su negocio, cumplir con las demandas de sus clientes, y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Eliu de Jesús is originally from the city of León. He is a business owner working in fast food sales. He feels grateful for Kiva and MiCrédito since he has already managed to establish his own business that has helped him earn more income. He requests this loan to buy: bread, lettuce, meat, tomatoes, tomato sauce, among other products for making hamburgers. Eliu thinks this loan will be very helpful, since he will be able to grow his business, meet the needs of his customers, and that way have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy bread, lettuce, meat, tomatoes, tomato sauce, among other items to make hamburgers.

loans.name: Merlin Yamileth

texts.es: Merlin de 27 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo  y sus dos hijos de 9 años y 4 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, venta de tamales y venta de helados. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones habitacionles. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pared para dividir un cuarto. Con el monto solicitado comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en:
Merlin, 27, lives in her own house with her husband and two children, ages 9 and 4.  She makes a living raising and selling chickens and selling tamales and ice cream.  She's a very hardworking and enterprising woman who does everything she can to give her children better living conditions.

Merlin's asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in building a wall to divide a room.  She'll buy bricks, cement, sand, and rebar with the requested amount.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and rebar to build a wall

loans.name: Yesenia Nataly

texts.es: Yesenia de 35 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y su pequeño hijo de 2 años de edad. Para Yesenia lo más importante es su familia y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para llevar el sustento diario. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de pan desde hace mucho tiempo. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar.  La vivienda donde habita es propia pero por falta de recursos económicos no ha podido hacer los trámites para escrituración de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para proceder lo antes posible y así poder contar con el documento que le ampare la tenencia de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 35 years old and lives with her husband and her small two-year-old son.  For Yesenia, her family is most important and she does everything she can to support them.  She has made a living for a long time by making bread.  This is how she earns a living and supports her household.

The house where she lives is her own but because she lacks financial resources she has not been able to apply for the deed to the house.  This is why she asks for a loan from FUSAI to proceed as soon as possible and thus be able to have the document that protects the occupancy of the house.

loans.use: to invest in the process of getting a deed for her house.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela, habita en un barrio marginal de Managua, junto a su esposo e hija, Estela Labora para una fábrica de galletas como ayudante de proceso o empacadora de productos, ella continua construyendo por partes su humilde vivienda ya que es una familia de escasos recursos que no pueden hacer estas inversiones de un solo gasto, por eso acuden a solicitar apoyo de crédito para comprar materiales de construcción para mejorar sus condiciones de vida, en esta ocasión empezara la construcción de porche para obtener un poco más de espacio en su hogar y prestar las condiciones cuando tenga sus nietos.
texts.en:
Estela lives in a neighborhood outside Managua with her husband and daughter. She works as a manufacturing and packaging assistant for a cookie factory. 

She is still building her humble home piece by piece. Since her family has limited resources, they cannot make the entire investment all at once. Therefore, they have applied for a loan to buy construction materials to improve their living conditions. On this occasion, she will start construction on a porch to have a bit more space in her home and to provide a place for her grandchildren when they come.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, blocks, beams, and zinc sheets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, zinc, and nails and paint for resale

loans.name: Rafic

texts.en:
Rafic is a 44-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two children, one of them working. In 2010, and after gaining 15 years of experience working in grocery stores, he opened his own shop where he started to sell detergents, dairy products, canned food, sweets, etc. 

Rafic is currently requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. in order to continue strengthening his business by buying goods such as sweets, soft drinks, and juices. This will allow him to offer a greater variety of products, meet various tastes, and improve sales and the family's income.

loans.use: to buy goods such as sweets, soft drinks, and juices

loans.name: United Group

texts.en:
The United group is made up of three members who are involved in diverse business activities. The members are happy in finding themselves in their sixth loan cycle. They are part of the larger group called Universal.

Jennifer is thirty-two-years-old and sells soft drinks. She is married to Francis, a forty-two-year-old civil servant. For seven years, she has been dedicated to selling soft drinks and provisions at her residence. Through this work she has been able to provide her children with the help of her husband better education and good food.

She will invest the loan in the purchase of soft drinks. Her greatest dream is to have a stall where she can operate and expand more.

The group is thankful to the Kiva investors for helping them to improve the economic standing of their families. The whole group needs an amount of GHS 1,900 to expand.

loans.use: To buy more and sell to customers

loans.name: Rene Miguel

texts.es: Miguel es un joven entusiasta trabajador  que vive en la comunidad del sardinal con sus padres y hermanos , el comenta que con sacrificio de sus padres logro estudiar hasta primer año de secundaria, ya después no continuo con los estudios pues le quedaba bastante lejos la escuela ademas debía ayudarle a su padre en los labores del campo trabajando la tierra, con cultivo de café y granos básicos , de ahí es la fuente de ingreso que tiene el y su familia para subsistir,aparte dice el se dedica a la compra , venta y reparación de motocicletas usadas lo hace como un pasatiempo ademas es otra fuente de ingreso . En la casa de sus padres nos comenta ya tienen un pequeño sistema solar pero quiere ampliarlo para tener mas luminarias en toda la casa ademas poder usar la plancha , radio y cargar los celulares, es por eso que realiza el tramita de crédito para comprar un modulo solar para su hogar y así mejorar la condición de vida de sus padres y sus hermanos
texts.en:
Miguel is a young, enthusiastic worker who lives in the community of Sardinal with his parents and siblings. He says that with his parents' sacrifice, he managed to study up until the first year of secondary school. Afterwards, he did not continue studying because the school was very far away and he felt that he should help his father with the farm labor by working the fields with coffee crops and basic grains. This is the source of income for him and his family to survive. He says that he also buys, sells and repairs used motorcycles. This is a hobby for him as well as an additional source of income. 

In his parents' home, there is already a small solar power system. They would like to expand this to have lights in the entire house, as well as to be able to use the iron, radio and charge cell phones. Therefore, he has applied for a loan to buy a solar module for his home to improve the quality of life for his parents and siblings.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel for his home.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es: Marcos, tiene la edad  de 35 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de herramientas y equipo para la construcción de viviendas o lugares comerciales, las cuales le facilitará la elaboración de los trabajos y así poder mejorar la calidad de los diseños y tipos de acabados y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido  mediante la práctica de varios años y  así poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de herramientas  y otros equipos, y  seguir brindando cada día un mejor servicio, además de aumentar la oferta en trabajos y calidad. Con esta compra pretende hacer más construcciones y con diseños más actualizados y con mayor variedad y así cumplir con los pedidos a un plazo más adecuado. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Marcos is 35 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children who are his top priority. With his loan he plans to buy tools and equipment for constructing homes and commercial properties, which will facilitate completion of these jobs. Marcos will be able to improve the quality of designs and types of finishes, to take advantage of knowledge gained during years on the job, and as such be able to have more income to continue investing in the purchase of tools and other equipment. He can continue offering better service every day, as well as increase the amount and quality of business. With this purchase he plans to do more construction, and with updated plans and better variety he can fulfill orders within a better time frame. This is the first loan Marco has received from FUDECOSUR. He has never had any state bank loans before, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with the most facilities and the lowest interest rate.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan tiene 68 años, está casado hace 47 años con la Sra. Julia de 63 años, juntos tuvieron 7 hijos, los cuales con mucho sacrificio han podido criarlos y darles todo lo que necesitaban para una vida digna.
Juan tiene su negocio de despensa y verdulería ubicada dentro de un mercado desde el año 1997,empezó con un capital que pudo juntar gracias a una buena producción agrícola que tuvo porque el señor además se dedica a la agricultura, realiza repartos por los negocios de los barrios y la señora atiende el negocio del mercado.
Él solicita el préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras en general,  maíz, arroz, fideos, aceite de este modo poder surtir su negocio y dar a sus clientes una mayor variedad y calidad de productos.
texts.en:
Juan, 68, has been married to Julia, 63, for 47 years. They have seven children together. With plenty of sacrifice, they raised their children and gave them everything they needed for a decent life.

Juan has had a small grocery and vegetable stand in a market since 1997. He started with a small amount of capital which he saved thanks to a good agricultural season. He also works in agriculture and makes deliveries to businesses in other neighborhoods while his wife takes care of the market stand.

He has applied for a loan to buy fruit and vegetables, corn, rice, beans, and oil. He will then be able to stock his business and give his clients a greater variety and quality of products.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, beans, oil, etc.

loans.name: Awatef

texts.en:
Awatef is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo.
Awatef is a 43-year-old married woman from Rafah city. She is a mother for six kids; four sons and two daughters. Awatef works as an employee in the public sector with a very low income. This income is barely able to cover all the family needs. Awatef decided to buy a small rickshaw for her son to work on it in transferring goods for the local traders, it helps the family for part of their expenses. 
Awatef took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new rickshaw for her son to transfer goods for the local traders. By taking this loan, Awatef's son will be able to improve his business and also his income.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her son to transfer goods for the local traders

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 26-year-old Lebanese single man. Four years ago, he started to work as a private teacher, receiving students at his house, where he provides them with the needed education. He works in parallel at installing specific programs on computers, which he has done since 2011. Hasan is forced to work simultaneously in two jobs as he really requires earning a good income to support his family money-wise. And today, with his youth loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l., he will purchase books and educational objects that will definitely ease his teaching work. 

Hasan is very positive about his future, and he is doing a great effort at this moment in time to improve his teaching room and acquire additional supplies to be able to receive more students in the next coming school season.

loans.use: to purchase books and educational objects

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
La señora María Isabel de 54  años de edad, vive con su esposo, no  tiene  hijos  que dependen de ella, vive en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras.
Doña  María Isabel tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 07 años  a la venta de tortilla, sus clientes le prefieren por su buen trato y también que ella atiende  a sus clientes en las dos jornadas.
Doña María es una mujer trabajadora y con deseos de salir adelante, está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de maíz, leña y cal, con el apoyo del préstamo suplirá su necesidad de financiamiento.
Doña María está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con Prisma, su sueño es mejorar su casa y tener otro negocio que le genere ingresos.

 San Lorenzo, Honduras- Diciembre del 2013.
texts.en:
María Isabel, 54, lives with her husband and has no dependent children. She lives in the community of San Lorenzo, a valley in the south of Honduras. María Isabel has her own home and has been selling tortillas for 7 years. Her clients prefer her business due to her good service and the fact that she serves clients on two working days. 

María is a hardworking woman with a desire to succeed. She is applying for a loan to buy corn, firewood and lime. With the support of this loan, she will cover her financial needs. 

María is very happy to continue working with Prisma. Her dream is to make improvements to her house and to have another business to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and lime for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more plastic chairs, tubs, buckets, baskets, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Kimsan's Group

texts.en:
Kimsan is 51 years old and a married father blessed with three kids. To strive for a living, he grows cassava and plants soy beans. This is the business that he has had for 9 years and it returns him currently about 28,700 KHR per day. This is the first microloan for Kimsan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). 

He is now forming a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to buy a hand tractor to grind his cassava as well as to plow his farmland. He hopes that he can gain a good income from his crop.

loans.use: To buy a hand tractor to grind his cassava as well as to plow his farmland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, zinc, nails and a locker door

loans.name: Milutin

texts.en:
Milutin is 46 years old and married with two children. He is living in one of the minority communities in Kosovo with his wife and their children, who are 14 and 18 years old; both children are attending school. Based on tradition, he has been working in a locksmith shop, which he started working at when he was very young. He recognized that this type of business is profitable, and has been staying in the field all of these years. He serves all of the people in the community regardless of ethnicity or nationality. 

Because he has been working for a long time, his tools have become old, broken and outdated, so he is requesting a loan to purchase new tools for his work. The loan will help him to increase his income as the new tools will help him to be more efficient and effective, and he is hoping in the near future to expand his business so that he can add more income and offer his children a better education. He appreciates this help and wants to thank all of the lenders!

loans.use: To purchase new tools for his locksmith work

loans.name: Dúo Huerto Del Eden Group

texts.es:
DUO HUERTO DEL EDEN
Doña Aura Roselia es originaria de Tecpan, tiene 27 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus dos hijos menores de edad que necesitan el cuidado de ella, ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa en el mercado municipal de Tecpan.
Ella ha empezado esta actividad desde hace algún tiempo, gracias a Dios ha mejorado y ha podido salir adelante.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposo ella sigue adelante con su negocio el trabaja como jornalero en una gasolinera y con el sueldo de el ayuda a su esposa.
Ella sueña con ampliar su negocio, tener más variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes ya que así tendrá mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos a la escuela esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa nueva para la venta.
texts.en: DUO HUERTO DEL EDEN (Garden of Eden Duo): Aura Roselia is from Tecpan. She is 27 years old, and among her responsibilities are two young children who need her care. She works in the sale of clothing in the city market of Tecpan. She started this business a short while ago, thanks to God it has improved and she has been able to expand. Thanks to the support of her husband Aura Roselia continues on with her business. He works as a day laborer in a gas station and his wages help his wife. Aura Roselia dreams of growing her business and having more variety of products to offer her customers, since then she will have greater earnings and send her children to school. She is requesting this loan to buy new clothing to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Эльмире 34 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Эльмиры -высшее образование, работает учителем в местной школе, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Эльмира занимается животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Эльмиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 14 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эльмира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Эльмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Elmira is 34 years old, married and raising 4 children with her husband. Elmira has a higher education and works as a teacher at a local school. To provide an additional income for her family, she is involved in animal husbandry, having started 9 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Elmira's hard work, today her business contains 2 dairy cows and 14 sheep. The monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Elmira requested a loan from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy sheep in order to increase livestock headcount. Elmira plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money for her children's continued education.

loans.use: to buy sheep in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Bubinazira

texts.ru: Бубиназире 47 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Старший сын находится на заработках в России, дочь замужем, остальные дети на иждивении родителей. У Бубиназиры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бубиназира занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 3,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Бубиназиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, а также имеет земельный надел размером 1,3 ГА, на которой выращивает: хлопок, кукурузу, клевер и картошку. В хозяйстве также помогают дети школьного возраста. Супруг занимается транспортировкой груза на собственной автомашине, имеет определенный доход. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бубиназира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для откорма. Доходы от кредита Бубиназира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерена собрать средства на проведение свадебного торжества для сына.
texts.en: Bubinazira is 47 years old, married and raising 5 children with her husband. Her oldest son is working in Russia, daughter is married, and the rest of the children are being supported by the parents.  Bubinazira has a secondary education. To provide the primary income for her family, she is involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started 20 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Bubinazira's hard work, today her business contains 3 dairy cows and a 1.3 hectare land plot, where she grows cotton, corn, clover and potatoes. Her school-age children also help her with the business.  Her husband is involved in transporting heavy loads with his own car and has a set income.  The aggregate monthly income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Bubinazira requested a loan from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy bulls for fattening up. Bubinazira plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to hold a wedding party for her son.

loans.use: to buy bulls for fattening up

loans.name: Rwentuha Development Association Group

texts.en:
Peace is a member of Rwentuha Development group and is a mother of two children who are aged four and two. 

She has a drug shop, and she works 12 hours per day. She started the business in 2009 and has carried it on to date for the purpose of getting income to support her family, which was the main reason why she started the business. In addition to the drug shop business, Peace also sells shoes, so as to boost her income so that she can have enough money to cater to the needs of her children. Her customers are people in her area of operation, and she hopes to buy more drugs for sale using the loan money. Lack of enough capital is her main challenge, but she believes that this will be no more if she gets the loan.

She is hopeful that if she continues to be the hardworking person she has always been, her business will grow, she will get enough money from the business, and she will be in a position to give a decent education to her growing children.

loans.use: To buy drugs to sell in her pharmacy

loans.name: Lesbia

texts.es:
La señora Lesbia de 23 años de edad, es madre soltera,  tiene un  hijo  que depende de ella, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras.
Doña Lesbia no tiene casa propia y vive en casa de una hermana, se dedica desde hace 02 años a la venta de ropa usada de forma ambulante,  sus clientes le prefieren por su buen trato y sus precios sus muy buenos.
 Doña Lesbia es una mujer que lucha día con día para sacar adelante a su hijo, es un cliente que es ejemplo de trabajo y estudio ya que estudia en la universidad.
Doña Lesbia está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de ropa como blusas, vestidos, faldas, pantalones, camisas, etc. para ambos sexos ya que tiene varios pedidos de ropa nueva clasificada, con el apoyo del préstamo espera suplir la necesidad de financiamiento, es un cliente que solicita por primera vez un préstamo a Prisma.
Doña Lesbia su sueño es mejorar su negocio.

 San Lorenzo, Honduras - Diciembre del 2013
texts.en:
Lesbia is 23 years old and is a single mother with a dependent son. She lives in a community in San Lorenzo, a valley in the south of Honduras. Lesbia does not have her own house and lives at a sister's house. For 2 years she has been selling used clothing as a street vendor and is popular with her customers because of her good service and very good prices. Lesbia is someone who works hard every day so she can bring up her son. As a client she is exemplary in her work and study, as she is studying at university.

Lesbia is asking for the loan to buy blouses, dresses, skirts, trousers, shirts etc. for men and women since she has several new orders for used clothing. With the help of the loan she hopes to have the capital she needs. This is the first time she has asked for a loan from Prisma. Lesbia's dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - December 2013

loans.use: to buy blouses, dresses, skirts, trousers, shirts etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards and enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. 

Apart from the dumplings and peas selling business, Mwanakombo operates a cashew nut selling business. She is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenya Shillings (KES) to purchase sacks of cashew nuts and use the rest for transportation costs. 

She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of cashew nuts and to use the rest for transportation costs.

loans.name: Ruziboy

texts.ru: Рузибой житель города Конибодом. Ему 52 года. Он активно занимается животноводством. Рузибою помогает в его деятельности жена. Это их семейный бизнес. Вот уже 15 лет как Рузибой занимается выращиванием мелкорогатого скота. У него имеется скотный двор, где он держит овец. Одновременно Рузибой со своей семьей занимается растениеводством. Сейчас он просит кредит для развития бизнеса овцеводства. У него во дворе осталось пару овец и поэтому он хочет увеличить поголовье овец. На сумму кредита Рузибой планирует купить трех овец. Он надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Ruziboy is a 52-year-old resident of Konibodom.  He is a sheep farmer by trade, and is helped by his wife as well; it's the family business, and they've been at it for the past 15 years.  They have a pen where they keep their sheep, and, apart from raising sheep, Ruziboy and his family also grow crops.  At the moment, he is seeking a loan to add more sheep to his farm.  He only has 2 sheep left, and would like to buy 3 more.  He is counting on your support.

loans.use: buy 3 sheep to help grow his livestock-raising business

loans.name: Nasalino

texts.es:
El Señor Nasalino  tiene 41 años, vive en pareja desde hace 16 años con el señora Julia, con quien tiene tres hijos. Sus hijos son su razón de lucha y el por qué se están esforzando por salir adelante.
El Sr. Nasalino se dedica hace 7 años  a la compra y venta de mandioca (una raíz típica que se come en el Paraguay). Se inició con un capital inicial que consiguió de su trabajo anterior, empezó a incursionar en este negocio y actualmente tiene formada su clientela y le surte a los negocios de los barrios de esta ciudad, trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas, además le da fuente de trabajo a 4 personas que le está ayudando diariamente a poder realizar sus ventas.
Solicita este préstamo para la compra de mandioca para la venta y también realizar el mantenimiento del vehículo que usa para el reparto de sus productos.
texts.en:
Nasalino  is 41 years old and for 16 years has lived with his partner Julia, with whom he has three children. Their children are their main focus in life and the reason why they are working hard to make progress. 

For the last 7years Nasalino has made a living buying and selling cassava (a typical root which is eaten in Paraguay). He began with initial capital which he made from his previous job and started out in the business. Now he has an established clientele and supplies businesses in areas around the city. He works every day from very early in the morning. Nasalino also provides employment for 4 people who help him with his sales on a daily basis.

Nasalino is asking for the loan to buy cassava to sell and also to carry out repairs on his vehicle which he uses to distribute his produce.

loans.use: to buy cassava and also carry out maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Djiguiya Group

texts.fr:
DJIGUIYA est un groupe de l’association MARIAMTON de KELEYA. Il regroupe 4 femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 50 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne six enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments  et de la restauration. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à KELEYA dans la  préfecture de BOUGOUNI (Région de SIKASSO, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leur clientèle, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso il y a six ans. Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt solidaire. 
MAIMOUNA, qui est la deuxième personne de la gauche vers la droite compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 10 sacs de mil et de condiments alimentaires.  Elle s’approvisionne à KELEYA et environnants  et vend ses galettes et condiments à KELEYA, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 30.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en: Djiguiya is a group from the Mariamton association of Keleya. It brings together 4 women who know one another through parentage and neighborly ties. They are 50 years old on average. Married with an average of six children, they run different businesses, such as buying and selling vegetables to make sauces and restaurants. They live in large traditional families in Keleya in the Bougouni prefecture (Sikasso prefecture, Republic of Mali). They have run small businesses for several years and are very sought after in their businesses. With the concern of satisfying the growing needs of their clientele, the members of the group decided to join the loan program of Soro Yiriwaso six years ago. They are on the fifth group loan. Maimouna, who is the second person from the left to the right, expects to use her loan to buy 10 bags of millet and vegetables for making sauces. She stocks up in Keleya and the surrounding area and sells her pancakes and vegetable for making sauces in Keleya at retail for cash and for credit, to a clientele made up of men and women. She hopes for a monthly profit of 30,000 f CFA, a sum which will allow her to pay back the loan and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase millet and vegetables for making sauces.

loans.name: Papa

texts.fr: Papa est un maraîcher âgé de 54 il est établi dans le village de Ronkh, marié et père de 9 enfants, il a commencé cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il est petit avec ses parents.Avec ce crédit, il achètera du semence de gombo, de tomate, d'aubergine violette et de l'herbicide.
texts.en:
Papa, age 54, is a farmer who lives in a village called Ronkh. He's married and the father of nine children. He started growing vegetables with his parents during his childhood.
